that the Illuminati is a powerful organization controlling world events from

behind the scenes. However, experts have thoroughly debunked these claims,

citing the lack of evidence and the fact that the original Illuminati was

disbanded in 1785 (Robinson, 2014).

4. The New World Order

The concept of a New World Order (NWO) has been the subject of various
